Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Bread
Butter
Egg White
Cinnamon

Recipe

Put a pan on heat 5
Put some Butter in the pan
Put the Egg White and the Cinnamon
Dip the Bread in the mixture
Put the bread on the pan for 3 minutes
Flip the bread and keep on pan for 2 and a half minutes
